subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Lindsay Davenport and Maria Sharapova set up a semifinal showdown Saturday in the Bausch & Lomb Championships at Amelia Island, Fla., winning quarterfinals Friday. The top-seeded Sharapova beat No. 10 Alona Bondarenko, 6-7 (9), 6-3, 6-2. Davenport, the No. 16 seed, advanced with a 6-4, 7-6 (3) victory over No. 8 Agnes Szavay. Sharapova is 5-1 lifetime against Davenport but has never faced her on clay, the surface at Amelia Island.
